# Usage Examples

Once configured, you can interact with the FPL MCP server through Claude Desktop using natural language:

## Player Analysis

```
"Who are the top midfielders by points per game?"
"Compare Haaland, Salah, and Son this season"
"Find me Arsenal players under Â£7m"
"Show me detailed stats for Bukayo Saka"
```

## Fixture Planning

```
"What teams have the best fixtures in the next 5 gameweeks?"
"Show me Liverpool's upcoming fixtures"
"Which fixtures are in gameweek 15?"
```

## League & Manager Insights

```
"Show me the standings for league 12345"
"Compare my team with John's team for gameweek 13"
"What differentials should I consider for my mini-league?"
```

## Strategic Recommendations

```
"Analyze my squad performance over the last 5 gameweeks"
"I have 2 free transfers, who should I bring in?"
"Who should I captain for gameweek 15?"
"When should I use my Triple Captain chip?"
```
